name: real sad dad
description:
Why are we seeing this REAL SAD DAD?.. Are they in an emotional crisis, or maybe financial shortage is the reason, or did a breakfast toast go the wrong way?

REAL SAD DAD is a serene experience packed with action and humanity.

Made for A Game By Its Cover 2018. Inspired by cover 138 a.k.a. REAL SAD DAD.

Voices by candle and myself <3
